__e: But for the moment, just bracket your contempt and try to see what she actually has the courage and conviction to really attempt here, because imagine what it must have felt like for her, for anyone.
How is it possible that one loves another so much.. But gets nothing but scorn and pain.
She's embracing everything I revile, and since I'm not gonna put up with any of her nonsense, you are.
I feel your scorn, and I know I'm the reason for your dissent when our cause can least afford it.
You don't seem to realize where a woman's scorn can lead.
You're my best friend, but you've earned my contempt again.
Please, let go of your contempt for life... before it destroys everything you hold dear.
Someone who felt the same as they did, someone who had the same wonderful contempt for life, liberty and the pursuit of happiness.
I love their courage, or their contempt for death, or whatever you want to call it.
You cannot feel more contempt for me than I hold for myself.
I despise her for my mother's sake and for my own as I loathe you and your kind.
My contempt for you is so real that to hear you speak like this... I'm now sure this business will never be anything serious.
